name: Conference of Peripheral Maritime Regions (CRPM)
legal: Not-for-profit association under French law (Association Loi 1901)
goal:
Tackling the disadvantages encountered by Europe's periphery

Promoting territorial cohesion in EU policies

Promoting Europe's maritime dimension

Exploiting the benefits of being close to European citizens

Making the voice of the regions heard in a global world
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Politique de cohésion, Politique maritime intégrée, accessibilité transports, Energie et climat, Coopération externe, migrations
